Qi Condensation.Description: Beginner cultivators refine Qi in their bodies.

Foundation Establishment.Description: Establishes a solid foundation for future breakthroughs.

Core Formation.Description: Creates a golden core that acts as a Qi reservoir.

Nascent Soul.Description: Cultivator forms a sentient soul, allowing external Qi control.

Spirit Lord.Description: Becomes one with natureâ€™s Qi, enhancing elemental mastery.

Soul Formation.Description: Refines soul essence, increasing spiritual awareness.

Spirit King.Description: Controls Qi externally and internally at will.

Heaven Ascension.Description: Ascends to a higher plane, breaking mortal limits.

Immortal Awakening.Description: A cultivator awakens divine senses, gaining immortality.

Celestial Emperor.Description: Ruler of celestial beings, able to reshape reality.

Void Shatterer.Description: Able to tear through space and time with sheer will.

Divine Transcendent.Description: Achieves god-like status, existing beyond mortal understanding.

Primordial Deity.Description: Exists before time itself, embodying creation's essence.

Abyss Monarch.Description: Can wield and command both light and darkness at will.

Eternal Sovereign.Description: Completely detached from time, existing in multiple realms.

Omniversal Ruler.Description: Oversees infinite dimensions, controlling existence itself.

True God.Description: Surpasses all known limitations, becoming an entity of pure will.

Elder Creator.Description: Can create and destroy universes with a mere thought.

Supreme Void.Description: Becomes the void itself, existing beyond all concepts.

Final Existence.Description: The last step before true omnipotence, beyond comprehension.
